## graphTweets 

`graphTweets` is an R package to visualise Twitter conversations. Check the [website](http://graphtweets.john-coene.com/) for examples and documentation.

## sigmajs 

<img src="http://sigmajs.john-coene.com/reference/figures/logo.png" style="max-height:250px;"/>

`sigmajs` lets you visualise social network in a highly configurable and interactive way. Check the [website](http://sigmajs.john-coene.com/) for examples and complete documentation.
